edu.umd.cs.psl.model.atom

Interface AtomManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtomEventFramework, PersistedAtomManager, SimpleAtomManager, TrainingMap

    public interface AtomManager
    Provides centralization and hooks for managing the GroundAtoms that are instantiated from a Database.

    By wrapping Database.getAtom(Predicate, GroundTerm...), an AtomManager gives additional control over the GroundAtoms that come from that Database.

    Additionally, AtomManagers can support other functionality that might require coordination by providing a single component to call to carry out tasks.

    An AtomManager should be initialized with the Database for which it is managing Atoms.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ResultList executeQuery(DatabaseQuery query)
      Calls Database.executeQuery(DatabaseQuery) on the encapsulated Database.
      GroundAtom getAtom(Predicate p, GroundTerm... arguments)
      Returns the GroundAtom for the given Predicate and GroundTerms.
      boolean isClosed(StandardPredicate predicate)
      Calls Database.isClosed(StandardPredicate) on the encapsulated Database.

    • Method Detail

      • getAtom

        GroundAtom getAtom(Predicate p,
                 GroundTerm... arguments)
        Returns the GroundAtom for the given Predicate and GroundTerms.

        This method must call Database.getAtom(Predicate, GroundTerm...) to actually retrieve the GroundAtom.

        Parameters:
        p - the Predicate of the Atom
        arguments - the GroundTerms of the Atom
        Returns:
        the Atom

      • executeQuery

        ResultList executeQuery(DatabaseQuery query)
        Calls Database.executeQuery(DatabaseQuery) on the encapsulated Database.
        Parameters:
        query - the query to execute
        Returns:
        the query results exactly as returned by the Database

      • isClosed

        boolean isClosed(StandardPredicate predicate)
        Calls Database.isClosed(StandardPredicate) on the encapsulated Database.
        Parameters:
        predicate - the predicate to check
        Returns:
        TRUE if predicate is closed in the Database
